name: Soumya Hirakki
aboutText:
Hello! I am working with Coupa Softwares as QA Tester. I completed B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering in 2016.

Strong in softeware functional and integration testing.
I have 3 years experince in Procurement domain.

I consider myself lucky that I got an opportunity to work at different levels like BA, programmer and tester. My areas of interest include bussiness procurment functional and integration testing.

experience.name: Coupa Softwares
experience.description:
Includes functional, regression and new feature testing.
Understand procurment domain to serve the best to the customers.
 Started with basic automation of functional scripts using ROR

experience.name: Zycus Infotech
experience.description: I have always been interested and enjoyed working in the computer industry, but I consider myself lucky that I got an opportunity to work at different levels like business analyst, programmer and solution architect apart from by assigned profile. My main strength is the ability to maintain a great rapport with the customer and my attention to their details.

projectData.name: Integration (Changi Airport)
projectData.description: Requirement gathering and delivering required configurations to perform UAT.

projectData.name: ERP Integrations
projectData.description: Zycus Integration has till now provided two ways of integration i.e API based and file based that includes both mastera and slave methods.

projectData.name: Coupa Procurement Certification
projectData.description: Joining Coupa I got an advantage to get the Procurment Certification done.

projectData.name: Perform UAT
projectData.description: Completed release testing for severval customer.

journeySteps.heading: 2016- Completed by graduation
journeySteps.description: Ended up with a first class degree certificate and some event organization and winning cerficates.

journeySteps.heading: Q Spiders
journeySteps.description: Got a chance to join a free course of Java and Testing, where I turned from a electronic person to software.

journeySteps.heading: Tech Mahindra(Mumbai)- 2016 Dec
journeySteps.description: Joined here as a Trainee, learned fun more prgrammimg languages.

journeySteps.heading: Home tutions
journeySteps.description: Teaching kids the cloud way of learning instead of mugging up.

journeySteps.heading: Zycus- 2017
journeySteps.description: The Integration Testing journey started with some new learning on APIs and web services with great training in procurement domain.

journeySteps.heading: Onsite to Singapore
journeySteps.description: It was a great learning and new experience to work with my customer closely.

journeySteps.heading: Coupa Softwares- 2019
journeySteps.description: Started my new journey of procurement here in Functional testing role. Also, got certifed with Coupa Procurement Certification.
